headline: Sherwin-Williams Weighs Acquisitions As Next Phase Of Growth
summary: Sherwin-Williams (NYSE:SHW) has indicated it is evaluating potential acquisitions following its latest annual results announcement. The company signaled that acquisitions could become part of its next phase of growth alongside its existing operations. Sherwin-Williams, known for its paints, coatings and related products across residential, commercial and industrial markets, is a large player in the global coatings sector. By flagging interest in new acquisitions, NYSE:SHW is putting...

headline: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
summary: Jim Jaye: Sherwin-Williams ended the year with strong fourth quarter results, driven by solid core performance and inclusive of the first full quarter of the Suvenil acquisition.  Reported gross margin was flattish year over year but expanded excluding the dilutive impact of the Suvenil acquisition.  Adjusted EBITDA in the quarter grew 13.4% and expanded 120 basis points to 17.7% as a percent of sales.

raw.headline: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Q4 2025 Earnings Transcript
raw.summary: Jim Jaye: Sherwin-Williams ended the year with strong fourth quarter results, driven by solid core performance and inclusive of the first full quarter of the Suvenil acquisition.  Reported gross margin was flattish year over year but expanded excluding the dilutive impact of the Suvenil acquisition.  Adjusted EBITDA in the quarter grew 13.4% and expanded 120 basis points to 17.7% as a percent of sales.

headline: Sherwin-Williams Stock Slips. Earnings Paint a Grim Picture of Customer Spending.
summary: Sherwin-Williams  presented a sobering picture of the state of consumer spending as the paint-and-coatings brand posted earnings for the fourth quarter.  Sherwin-Williams surpassed forecasts for both its top and bottom line.  Adjusted earnings came to $2.23 a share, surpassing the $2.04 consensus among analysts polled by FactSet.

headline: Sherwin-Williams' Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: SHW tops Q4 estimates as revenues rise 5.6% Y/Y, with strength in Consumer Brands and Performance Coatings and an upbeat 2026 outlook.

headline: Sherwin-Williams’s (NYSE:SHW) Q4 CY2025: Beats On Revenue
summary: Paint and coating manufacturer Sherwin-Williams (NYSE:SHW) reported Q4 CY2025 results beating Wall Street’s revenue expectations, with sales up 5.6% year on year to $5.60 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $2.23 per share was 3.1% above analysts’ consensus estimates.

headline: Sherwin-Williams (SHW) Beats Q4 Earnings and Revenue Estimates

headline: Sherwin-Williams: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: CLEVELAND (AP) — Sherwin-Williams Co. (SHW) on Thursday reported fourth-quarter profit of $476.8 million. The Cleveland-based company said it had profit of $1.92 per share. Earnings, adjusted for costs related to mergers and acquisitions and severance costs, came to $2.23 per share.
